overview: From the Nazi Blitzkrieg in 1939 to the Pearl Harbor attack in 1941, the Axis tide rolled unchecked. But Axis luck was about to turn in a series of bloody showdowns. Review the battles that spelled doom for Hitler and his allies and led to V.E. Day, a day that came too late for millions of civilians as well as soldiers who gave their lives.
title: Battles That Doomed Hitler
